solution_line_template: The total number of miles for a round trip is {destination_miles} x {round_trip_multiplier}= <<{destination_miles}*{round_trip_multiplier}={total_round_trip_miles}>>{total_round_trip_miles}.
Therefore, he needs to refill his motorcycle {total_round_trip_miles}/{miles_per_refill} = <<{total_round_trip_miles}/{miles_per_refill}={num_refills}>>{num_refills} times.
